title: Cosy Northern Ireland 30 Minutes from Belfast City Centre
description: Enjoy a quiet countryside escape with easy access to Belfast city centre at Holiday Inn Express Antrim - M2. JCT.1, an IHG Hotel. Take a scenic drive around Northern Ireland's jagged cliffsides, admire the spectacular basalt columns of the Giant's Causeway or stay local and embrace the greenery at Antrim Castle Gardens. After a day of sightseeing, retreat to your base for a hearty meal at the Great Room or an evening pint at the Lobby Bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Antrim - M2, JCT.1, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Ballymena Road, Antrim BT41 4LL, United Kingdom
